  • Constructor Details

    • edit_appt_ctlr

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Fetches the list of contacts, users, and customers; sets the time zone label to reflect the one the user is in; converts the date in datepicker to desired format. Clears the spinners before input is added. Additionally loads the selected appointments details in.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • clickSaveAppt

      void clickSaveAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Runs validation checks on the fields and against the business hours. If successful, it modifies the appointment in the database and returns to the appointment screen, with the updated appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • loadData

      public static void loadData(Appointment selA)
      Loads appointment data.
      Parameters:
      selA - the selected appointment from the main appointment screen.

    • clickCancel

      void clickCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Exits the edit appointment function without saving.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • checkLength

      public boolean checkLength()
      Checks the field lengths on text field/area; used for input validation.
      Returns:
      the boolean on successful validation

    • checkCompletion

      public boolean checkCompletion()
      Check if the form fields have been filled out; used for input validation.
      Returns:
      the boolean on successful validation

    • resetFields

      public void resetFields()
      Resets the form fields.

    • resetErrorMsg

      public void resetErrorMsg()
      Resets the errorStyle border on the fields, and removes the error message in the error labels.
